title: WSJ: Trump's Watergate?
text:
Is This Trump’s Watergate? Unless Team Trump gets back to the basics of the 2016 election, 1974 could return. Opinion Journal Video: Wonder Land Columnist Dan Henninger on the fallout from the Trump administration's scandals. Photo credit: Zuma Press. By Google+ Feb. 15, 2017 7:00 p.m. ET 
A president’s blood is in the water and another White House staff can only look out the windows as the sharks arrive from miles off. 
Dan Rather, who normally toils at explaining away his George W. Bush National Guard story for CBS years ago, swam toward the Trump White House Tuesday to posit that “Watergate is the biggest political scandal of my lifetime, until maybe now.” 
Like-minded trolls in the social-media village sent... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In Most Popular Videos
